title: Schema for damage deck data files (original and tfa)

name.description: The card's name as written on the card itself.

amount.description: Indicates how many cards of this type are included in it's source.

type.description: Defines the type/scope of the damage this card does when dealt faceup.

text.description: The card's text describing its effect.

image.description: The file path for this damage card's image.

section.description: Defines the ship's section this card affects.
